title: Animated FPS M203 Grenade Launcher with VFX/SFX and Bonus Attachments
description: This weapon pack contains a fully functioning M203 grenade launcher with multi-range sighting, grenade ammunition, and bonus rail integration system adapters.
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=fBO_taV3uRw&feature=youtu.be


Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


This pack contains a fully functioning standalone M203 weapon with multi-range sighting, four variants of the M203 attachment, the M381 grenade ammunition, and bonus RIS components. This pack includes weapon and arm animations, visual effects, and sound effects. You can use the grenade launcher as an attachment to other weapons, or as its own implement of destruction. Either way, its sure to add some bang to your players' arsenals.


Check out our seller page for other great products. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Black%20Fang%20Technologies

Be sure to comment any suggestions, concerns, or praises down bellow. If you buy, be sure to leave a rating.

Reach out to us at xbl.black.fang@gmail.com for support.

Follow us on Twitter @BlackFangTech for updates and special offers.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Grenadier character Blueprint
  •  Standalone M203 weapon Blueprint
  •  M203 attachment Blueprint
  • M203 sight attachments
  • Four variations of M203 attachment mesh
  • M381 grenade; casing, projectile, and full grenade meshes
  • Particle FX
  • Sound FX
  • 3-way and 4-way RIS adapters
  • Rounded hand guards
  • First person arm animations
  • Weapon animations

Texture Sizes:

  •  256x256
  •  512x512
  •  1024x1024
  • 2048x2048
  • 4096x4096

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Collision: Yes, custom

LODs: No

Number of Meshes: 14

Vertex Count: 4164, 4113, 4737, 4788, 4432, 969, 126, 2656, 3778, 4836, 256, 281, 383, 296

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 13

Number of Textures: 23

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
